CustomField.formula: CASE(Landfill_Agreement__c , "Yes", 25, 0)+ CASE(Integration_Type__c , "API",20,"Flat File", 20,"Supplier Portal",15,"Email",10,"Fax",5,0)+ CASE(Payment_Methods__c, "CC",10,"ACH",6,"Paper",2,0)+ CASE( Invoice_Method__c, "EDI",15,"Email",9,"Mail",3,0)
CustomField.label: Supplier Score
